publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1991 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motionâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, on Wednesday 6 June, the meeting of the Committee of the Whole Parliament to take Stage 2 of the Scottish Local Authorities (Tendering) Bill should begin immediately the first meeting of the Parliament that day has closed and end no later than 3.30pm, and that at the second meeting of the Parliament, consideration of Stage 3 of the Bill should end by 4.00pm. Supported by: Euan Robson*
